title: Sinovac's COVID-19 vaccine has 91% efficacy, Turkey says
author: SINAN TAVSAN
description: Health minister says early results show Chinese-developed shot is 'safe'
cleaned_text: ISTANBUL -- Sinovac Biotech's COVID-19 vaccine candidate has shown an efficacy of 91.25% in Turkey, officials said Thursday, reporting the latest results of clinical trials of the Chinese-developed shot beyond China. Turkish Health Minister Fahrettin Koca and professor Serhat Unal, a member of the government's COVID-19 advisory board, reported the preliminary results of Phase 3 trials at a news conference in Ankara.
